thread.title: Snowiest December in Seoul in over 40 years | DW News
thread.title_full: Snowiest December in Seoul in over 40 years | DW News

author: Ava
title: Snowiest December in Seoul in over 40 years | DW News
text:
South Korea saw record snowfall this December, eclipsing previous records over the last 40 years.
It snowed over 10 cm on Saturday alone.
